========================================
DEPLOYMENT SUCCESSFUL! 
========================================
        
Next Steps:
1. SSH into Nginx server: ssh ec2-user@51.112.187.138
2. Edit Nginx config: sudo vim /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
3. Update backend IPs in upstream block:
    - BACKEND_IP_1: 10.0.10.209
    - BACKEND_IP_2: 10.0.10.159
    - BACKEND_IP_3: 10.0.10.107
4. Restart Nginx: sudo systemctl restart nginx
5. Test: http://51.112.187.138
        
Backend Servers:

    - web-2: 3.28.215.229 (private: 10.0.10.159)
